title: Roy Hargrove - 1994 - Approaching Standards FLAC
description:
Roy Hargrove - 1994 - Approaching Standards

...Ballads dominate the album, accounting for seven of the album's ten tracks; Hargrove generally interprets them in a cool, emotionally detached manner...Compiled from four albums whose recording dates span from 1989 to 1993, Approaching Standards...also documents Hargrove's growth as a musician. "Everything I Have is Yours/Dedicated to You," taken from the 1993 recording Of Kindred Souls, finds Hargrove in a more mature frame of mind, and points toward the much better albums he would soon make. (AllMusic)

Track list:
01 - Easy to Remember
02 - Ruby My Dear
03 - Whisper Not
04 - What's New
05 - September in the Rain
06 - You Don't Know What Love Is
07 - End of a Love Affair
08 - Things We Did Last Summer
09 - Everything I Have Is Yours
10 - My Shining Hour

Personnel:
Roy Hargrove - trumpet, flugelhorn
Al Foster - drums
Ron Blake - soprano & tenor saxophones
Gregory Hutchinson - drums
Frank Lacy - trombone
Also: Christian McBride, Billy Higgins, Marc Cary, Antonio Hart, Scott Colley, John Hicks, Rodney Whitaker, Stephen Scott

Enjoy and share!
